references.reason: This paper introduces BoT-SORT, the core tracking algorithm used in the study, making it essential for understanding the tracking component of the baseline.
This paper introduces YOLOv12, the primary detection model leveraged in this work, making it fundamental to understand the detection part of the method.

references.paper_title: Simple online and realtime tracking with a deep association metric
references.reason: This paper introduces DeepSORT, a widely used tracking algorithm, is important because the study explicitly contrasts its performance against the BoT-SORT tracker.

references.paper_title: Yolov7: Trainable bag-of-freebies sets new state-of-the-art for real-time object detectors
references.reason: The YOLOv7 paper is cited as a comparison point within the broader YOLO object detection series, offering valuable context.

references.paper_title: Deep learning for person re-identification: A survey and outlook
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of Re-ID, which is essential for understanding the Re-ID module in BoT-SORT-ReID.
